name: Sales Order Report for WooCommerce
author: E-soft Creator

sections.description:
Sales Order Report for WooCommerce

Sales reporting with various Charts, Summary & Download

The sales order report for WooCommerce plugin is helpful to WooCommerce order sales analysis and WooCommerce order reporting with various important metrics data, given the order sales summary, cart abandoned orders list and download orders report. present orders report and chart with different date range options.

The performance of the sales order report for WooCommerce plugin is the ability to fetch order report data is very fast with the Varis multiple charts and important sales various metrics data.

The plugin report helps them view data related to their total sale, net sale, total order, shipping, taxes, etc to help to grow their business. also gives the order status-wise sales information.

Sales order key data have both options to view and download the CSV file. order report includes User email, Order ID, Date, Product name, Quantity, Line amount, Shipping, TAX.

The sales order report for WooCommerce is given the advanced features of Capture the customer’s cart abandoned details.

FEATURES:

  • Sales order analysis with different date range options like Today, Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, This Month, Last Month, Max 2 Months any date range allows.
  • Varis Charts analysis like, Total Sales, Net Sales, Total Orders, Average order value, Refund orders, Refund amount, Discount amount, Total TAX, Order TAX, Shipping TAX, Total shipping, Total users, Unique Users, Orders Status.
  • Represents the WooCommerce store important metrics of sales order performance with good visual UI.
  • Different charts are given visibility of easy to understanding to analyze sales order.
  • Give sale order summary with various date range
  • Download the sales order report with Order ID, Date, Product name, Quantity, Line amount, Shipping, TAX.
  • Both options are there, users can view and download for WooCommerce sales order report.
  • Capture the WooCommerce store cart abandoned orders, If users have not placed an order after that 1 hour, the cart order details will add to the cart abandoned list. the cart abandoned list collects Customer email, Customer type (guest or register), Order date, Order Day Type, Order Quantity, Order Total.
sections.faq:
What does the plugin do?

The sales order report for WooCommerce plugin is dispaying varios cahrt and order summary for analysis of the WooCommerce store sales.

The plugin supports a large no of orders?

Yes, the Sales Order Report for WooCommerce plugin gives faste response to View or download the WooCommerce order detail information.
sections.changelog:
2.1.1 – 09/12/2021

  • Bug fixed

2.1.0 – 27/11/2021

  • Add new report ‘Order status wise performance’ on the sales data analysis page
  • fixed issue of clear cart abandoned data while change data range
  • add product link in view order list on report download page
  • UI changes

2.0.1 – 26/11/2021

  • enhancement in capture cart abandoned details of WooCommerce store

2.0.0 – 24/10/2021

  • Add new feature, the capture cart abandoned details of WooCommerce store
  • fixed the chart order date ordering isuue on the sales analysis page

1.2.0 – 16/10/2021

  • Now Sales order report for WooCommerce plugin supports the Arabic and German (Deutsch) languages.

1.1.0 – 10/10/2021

  • Add a chart to display new and unique users counts who have placed WooCommerce orders
  • add both option view and download for WooCommerce sales order report
  • Charts enhancement release

1.0.0 – 11/09/2021

  • First release
  • Sales order report snalysis
  • Sales order summary report
  • Sales order report download

screenshots.caption: Sales chart analysis page, Different date range options like Today, Last 7 Days, Last 30 Days, This Month, Last Month, Max 2 Months any date range allow
Sales performance in between total sale and net sale
Charts present the sales info like, no of orders, average order value, refund orders, refund amount
Charts present discount amount, total TAX, order TAX, shipping TAX
Display chart for new and unique users counts who have placed WooCommerce orders
Give sale order summary with various date range
Users have both options on click the respective button to view and download WooCommerce sales order report
